DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study confirm result prior study demonstrated pill contain two amino acid food increase growth hormone insulin-like growth factor-1 .
DOC.detailed_description: Oral supplementation key combination derivative show increase human growth hormone healthy volunteer peak 90 minute IGF-1 8 hour post-administration .
DOC.criteria: 12 healthy male 4 healthy female Between 18 70 year Pregnant nursing Taking chronic medication include birth control pill .
